Generate annotation text for a single file

Source: R/put_auto.R
generate_annotation_for_file.Rd

Generate annotation text for a single file

Usage

generate_annotation_for_file(file, style = "multiline")

Arguments

file

Path to source file

style

Annotation style ("single" or "multiline")

Value

Annotation string
